column1: #Text=Korra says : " Yeah , but I do n't know why .
#Text=Often the element that 's the most difficult for the Avatar to master is the one most opposite to the Avatar 's personality .
#Text=Well , I 'm about as opposite an airbender as you can get .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Let 's begin your first lesson .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Korra 's gon na airbend !
#Text=" Korra says : " What is that contraption ?
